event.title: were hospitalized in serious but stable condition today

data.event: 2 men hospitalized after being shot in South L.A.. Two men were hospitalized in serious but stable condition today with gunshot wounds that they suffered at a liquor store parking lot in South Los Angeles, authorities said.

event.title: took place at the corner of East 51st Street and Avalon Boulevard about 11:20 p.m. Wednesday

data.event: The shooting took place at the corner of East 51st Street and Avalon Boulevard about 11:20 p.m. Wednesday, said a lieutenant at the Los Angeles Police Department's Newton Station.
